features: 💻 Why Do You Need a Webcam Cover Slide? — Safeguard your privacy by covering your webcam with our reliable webcam cover when not in use. Don't let anyone secretly watch you. Stay protected!
✅ Thin & Stylish — Enhance your laptop's functionality and aesthetics with our 0.027" ultra-thin webcam covers. Seamlessly close your laptop while adding a touch of sophistication.
✅ Fits Most Devices — Compatible with laptops, phones, tablets, desktops! Keep your privacy intact on Ap/ple, Mac/Book, iPh/one, iP/ad, H/P, L/novo, De/ll, Ac/er, As/us, Sa/msung devices.
✅ 365 Days Protection — Our upgraded 3.0 adhesive ensures a strong hold that won't damage your equipment. Experience reliable, long-term privacy protection day in and day out.

✅ Easy to Use — Simplify your privacy protection with 4 easy steps—clean, apply adhesive, align with the camera lens, press for 10 seconds, and slide to close. Note: Not suitable for full-screen or notched tempered film devices.

Most Frequently Asked Questions ● Will it block the screen after using this camera cover slide? These webcam stickers are small enough not to block anything but the camera lens. ● Will this phone camera cover scratch the screen or touchpad？ This webcam slide cover will not scratch your screen or touchpad, it has the proper adhesion and will not leave marks on your lens. ● What kind of camera is this webcam privacy cover suitable for? The webcam cover slide works for almost all cameras since it's enough thin! ● Can this camera sticker be used on textured surfaces? Slightly textured should work just fine. You can trust the stickiness of this laptop camera cover slide. Friendly Tips: Be careful not to block the speaker when you stick it on the phone!

Fits Perfectly The 0.027-inch slim, perfectly curved edges and ultra-miniature size means it works perfectly on your device and doesn't interfere with closing your laptop. Easy to Install Peel, stick, done. Just take off the sticky adhesive and place one side over the webcam ​and be adjusted after sticking. The slider slides with ease and doesn't affect the camera's view when in use. Durable and Proper Adhesion This upgraded camera cover features a better, stronger, more durable 3M self-adhesive sticker that won't peel off or leave marks on the screen as easily as other similar, but cheaper, products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Privacy Protection
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Webcam Cover (3 Pack) by Yilador, and I am delighted to say that this product has exceeded my expectations. This is actually my second purchase, as I wanted to ensure that both my laptop and iPad were equipped with reliable privacy protection.Privacy is a growing concern in our increasingly digital world, and Yilador's Webcam Cover Slide offers an excellent solution. The 0.03-inch ultra-thin design is sleek and unobtrusive, allowing me to easily slide the cover open or closed when needed. Its thinness ensures that it doesn't interfere with the laptop or iPad's closing mechanism, allowing for hassle-free use.The adhesive backing provided a secure and long-lasting attachment to my devices. Even after several months of use, the webcam covers have stayed in place without any signs of peeling or losing their grip. This reliability is crucial as it ensures that my privacy is protected at all times.One of the standout features of the Yilador Webcam Cover Slide is its versatility. The pack includes three covers, allowing me to protect multiple devices simultaneously. I appreciate the convenience of having spare covers for future use or for sharing with family members who also prioritize their privacy.The ease of use is another aspect worth mentioning. Sliding the cover open or closed requires minimal effort, and the smooth sliding mechanism ensures a seamless experience. It's a small action that gives me peace of mind, knowing that my camera is securely covered and my privacy is safeguarded.Furthermore, the Webcam Cover Slide does not leave any residue or marks on my devices when removed. This is especially important for laptop and iPad users who value the aesthetics and condition of their devices. I have had no issues with sticky residue or damage to the surfaces of my devices.In conclusion, the Yilador Webcam Cover (3 Pack) is an excellent investment for anyone concerned about their privacy. Its ultra-thin design, strong adhesive, and ease of use make it a reliable and convenient solution. This being my second purchase, I can confidently recommend these webcam covers for both laptops and iPads. With its high-quality construction and outstanding performance, it deserves a well-deserved five-star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Decent For the Price
reviews.reviewText: These camera covers were pretty decent for the price I had one placed on every device owned (this would include all the phones, tablets, computers etc).All the displayed amount comes in the set.They fit pretty well over the cameras for Android and Mac devices, and stay in place especially for the tablet and computers.The only issue I had was with the phone as the adhesiveness started to wear off with the constant putting in and taking the phone out of one's pocket. It fell off within the first 3 weeks.But for all the other devices it has stayed on there since the point of purchase up until now so I would definitely recommend this cover up for someone and they're very easy to slide across, it's pretty small, flat and the color makes it seamless when blending in on devices.*Saved us from countless Zoom and GoogleMeet Embarrassments. Attached some pics of what they look likeOh and they're not see through

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and effective
reviews.reviewText: Nice little cam cover. Hardly noticeable, which is what I wanted. Easy to apply and operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Falls off my phone screen at time but I think it because I moved it a lot before setting it in place. It works great and for the price it’s definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Webcam Cover Works for Both Smartphone and Computer
reviews.reviewText: It does what it claims. It adheres well. I have not had any problem with it falling off of both my iPhone and MacBook. It's a perfect size and doesn't abstract the camera or the light that indicates the camera is on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works, but not durable
reviews.reviewText: This product was very easy to apply to my laptop and held on great, until the first time I closed my laptop. The sliding piece fell off as soon as I reopened it and I was not able to get it to fit back in, so I had to throw it away. Good thing it comes with multiples, I guess. I have made a point to keep my laptop open since then, so as not to damage the next one. I am sure the next two will also break eventually, I won't be repurchasing from this company since they cannot hold up to the laptop being closed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars make sure you use these
reviews.reviewText: I hate the fact that phones have cameras on both sides of them and there's no way to turn them off or hide it when using. The fact that not every laptop has these built in also makes me mad. If you have a laptop and there's no cover for it... Buy this product. It's cheap and it works. PROTECT YOURSELF!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy, but does the job
reviews.reviewText: These do work great, but they are also very flimsy and will probably come apart at least once while trying to put them on your computer. However, they’re easy to put back together.
tres delicat ,faut y aller doucement en le placent,car colle tres rapidement,je vait voir a la longue si sa reste coller.
Perfectas, quedan exactas en la camara.

Needed something other than the Post-It note I was using to cover the camera on my 2021 MacBook Air so ordered these nifty little sliders. Very happy with them, they were a breeze to install and have stayed stuck down (adhesion good) and looks discrete and easy to slide open/closed as required.
